extension.description: Displays a list of users logged in with a link to their profile.

field.name: mode
field.label: Display Mode
field.description: Select the mode this module should display.

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the top of the module.

field.name: posttext
field.label: Post-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the bottom of the module.

field.name: limit
field.label: Limit
field.description: Set the maximum number of latest entries to display. Leave empty for no limit.

field.name: cb_plugins
field.label: CB Plugins integration
field.description: Choose if you want to use CB events for CB plugins integration. Plugins must be installed and configured in CB plugins management. Warning: this loads CB plugins on each page where this module is displayed, consuming memory and processing power.

field.name: custom_field
field.label: Field
field.description: Select the CB field to order the latests list by.

field.name: label
field.label: Label Display
field.description: Select how to display counter labels.

field.name: separator
field.label: Thousands Separator
field.description: Set what character to use for separating counters in the thousands. Default comma.
